Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is perfectly suited to meet your needs. Given its high value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $7500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the product's true worth is $8000. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
